com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs

Class MessageListener<T extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.MessageListener<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HcsDidTopicListener, HcsVcTopicListener

    public abstract class MessageListener<T extends Message>
extends java.lang.Object
    A listener of confirmed messages from a HCS identity topic. Messages are received from a given mirror node, parsed and validated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageListener

        public MessageListener(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.consensus.ConsensusTopicId topicId)
        Creates a new instance of a topic listener for the given consensus topic. By default, invalid messages are ignored and errors are not.
        Parameters:
        topicId - The consensus topic ID.

    • Method Detail

      • extractMessage

        protected abstract MessageEnvelope<T> extractMessage(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.mirror.MirrorConsensusTopicResponse response)
        Extracts and parses the message inside the response object into the given type.
        Parameters:
        response - Response message coming from the mirror node for for this listener's topic.
        Returns:
        The message inside an envelope.

      • isMessageValid

        protected abstract boolean isMessageValid(MessageEnvelope<T> message,
                                          com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.mirror.MirrorConsensusTopicResponse response)
        Validates the message and its envelope signature.
        Parameters:
        message - The message inside an envelope.
        response - Response message coming from the mirror node for for this listener's topic.
        Returns:
        True if the message is valid, False otherwise.

      • addFilter

        public MessageListener<T> addFilter(java.util.function.Predicate<com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.mirror.MirrorConsensusTopicResponse> filter)
        Adds a custom filter for topic responses from a mirror node. Messages that do not pass the test are skipped before any other checks are run.
        Parameters:
        filter - The filter function.
        Returns:
        This listener instance.

      • subscribe

        public MessageListener<T> subscribe(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.mirror.MirrorClient mirrorClient,
                                    java.util.function.Consumer<MessageEnvelope<T>> receiver)
        Subscribes to mirror node topic messages stream.
        Parameters:
        mirrorClient - Mirror client instance.
        receiver - Receiver of parsed messages.
        Returns:
        This listener instance.

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe()
        Stops receiving messages from the topic.

      • handleResponse

        protected void handleResponse(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.mirror.MirrorConsensusTopicResponse response,
                              java.util.function.Consumer<MessageEnvelope<T>> receiver)
        Handles incoming messages from the topic on a mirror node.
        Parameters:
        response - Response message coming from the mirror node for the topic.
        receiver - Consumer of the result message.

      • handleError

        protected void handleError(java.lang.Throwable err)
        Handles the given error internally. If external error handler is defined, passes the error there, otherwise raises RuntimeException or ignores it depending on a ignoreErrors flag.
        Parameters:
        err - The error.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Runtime exception with the given error in case external error handler is not defined and errors were not requested to be ignored.

      • reportInvalidMessage

        protected void reportInvalidMessage(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.mirror.MirrorConsensusTopicResponse response,
                                    java.lang.String reason)
        Reports invalid message to the handler.
        Parameters:
        response - The mirror response.
        reason - The reason why message validation failed.

      • onError

        public MessageListener<T> onError(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> handler)
        Defines a handler for errors when they happen during execution.
        Parameters:
        handler - The error handler.
        Returns:
        This transaction instance.

      • onInvalidMessageReceived

        public MessageListener<T> onInvalidMessageReceived(java.util.function.BiConsumer<com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.mirror.MirrorConsensusTopicResponse,java.lang.String> handler)
        Defines a handler for invalid messages received from the topic. The first parameter of the handler is the mirror response. The second parameter is the reason why the message failed validation (if available).
        Parameters:
        handler - The invalid message handler.
        Returns:
        This transaction instance.

      • onDecrypt

        public MessageListener<T> onDecrypt(java.util.function.BiFunction<byte[],java.time.Instant,byte[]> decrypter)
        Defines decryption function that decrypts submitted message attributes after consensus is reached. Decryption function must accept a byte array of encrypted message and an Instant that is its consensus timestamp, If decrypter is not specified, encrypted messages will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        decrypter - The decryption function to use.
        Returns:
        This transaction instance.
